meanings.definition: A defensive organ found in certain caterpillars that emits a foul odor to deter predators.
meanings.sent1: The osmeteria of the caterpillar releases a bad smell when threatened.
meanings.sent2: I learned that the osmeteria of some caterpillars can protect them from harm.
meanings.sent3: The caterpillar's osmeteria decided to throw a stinky party to keep the predators away.
meanings.sent4: The osmeteria acted like a smelly shield, protecting the caterpillar from danger.
meanings.sent5: The foul odor from the osmeteria was so strong, it made the predator run away quickly.
